foreground.android9: We need to access your location while using the app. Please Click `Allow` .
foreground.android10: We need to access your location while using the app. Please Click `KEEP AND DON'T ASK AGAIN` .
foreground.android11: We need to access your location while using the app. Please Click `WHILE USING THE APP` .

background.android9: We need to access your location even when the app is in background. Please Click  `Allow` .
background.android10: We need to access your location even when the app is in background. Please Click `ALLOW ALL THE TIME` .
background.android11: We need to access your location even when the app is in background. Please Click Give Permissions -> Permissions -> Location -> All the time.
